dmca.title: Mir Internet Marketing Claims Copyright Infringement (#42)
dmca.body:
Mir Internet Marketing, Inc.
[private]
Chicago, Illinois 60607

March 09, 2004

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Google Customer Support Professionals,

1.	The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.seologic.com/faq/most-popular-search.php

	Search Query: http://www.google.com/search? sourceid=navelient menuext&ie=UTF8&oe=UTF8&q=%22 Google+is+by+far+the+most+used+search+engine+today %2E+In+addition+to+providing+Web+search+at+its+home+page %22 "Google is by far the most used search engine today. In addition to providing Web search at its home page"

Infringing Web Page: http://www.esenz.co.uk/website_submission.html 

2. 	My Contact Information: [private]@internetmadeeasy.com

3.	Infringer's Contact Information:
	esenz web design and promotion
	Form contact only: http://www.esenz.co.uk/contact.html

4.	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

5.	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

[private], CEO 
Mir Internet Marketing, Inc. 
p. (xxx) xxx-xxxx 
e. [private]@internetmadeeasy.com
